info.name: Banking Hub - Premier - Trial Plan Postman Collection
info.description:
*******************************************************************

Prerequisites to run REST Operation Requests in this collection.

   Enter valid "CURRENT VALUE" for the following Variables in this collection.

   1. OrgId : Organization ID
   2. authToken_UserName : Use API Key provided by Dev Studio
   3. authToken_Password : Use API Secret Provided by Dev Studio

*******************************************************************
